hero.subtitle: I'm an Argentina-based Software Engineering Student and Full-Stack Developer focused on developing clean, user-friendly, and fast experiences.

about.top: I'm a full-stack developer with more than three years of professional experience working on front-end and back-end projects. I have a passion for technology, incredible ideas, and teaching programming.
about.bottom: I study Software Engineering at the Instituto Tecnol√≥gico de Buenos Aires (ITBA) and work as a Full-Stack Freelancer at Toptal. I'm also the first and former vice president and co-founder of IEEE's Computer Society ITBA Argentina branch here in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

passion.text: My passion is building reliable, efficient software and experiences.
